author: A_Brickset_user
title: Intresting "transform" capabilities
review: I got it sometime when I was six years old, and build it in less than a day. The construction/design of the transform-mechanics in this model is quite interesting, it kept me entertained for long times when I built and played with it, and I learned a lot. It is a great starter set, and I believe you even can install an early-type lego engine in it. (which I did later). I do not remember having any problems with the model, but I do remember being a bit scared by the looks of it in the night (creepy eyes) :)

author: A_Brickset_user
title: It's all about the transformation robot/truck
review: For me this robot/truck was the ultimate technic set. This was one of the two earliest Technic sets I owned (the other was 8842), and was by far my favourite. I would build it and rebuild it over and over again, and I liked the alternative model, a buggy, just as much. There are so many beam parts for make-your-own vehicle designs, too.
